diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@
class MqttSourceSpec

comments.body: Use different client ids for both sources. For example `testator` and `executor`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +186,190 @@              .withClientId("source-spec/testator")
              .withBroker("tcp://localhost:1337")
              .withWill(Will(MqttMessage(willTopic, ByteString("ohi")), MqttQoS.AtLeastOnce, retained = true)),
            Map(willTopic -> MqttQoS.AtLeastOnce))
        val source = MqttSource(settings, 8)

comments.body: You should start the *testator* source in this block so the *executor* does not miss the last will message.
lwt is retained, so *testator* should not miss the lwt even if subscribes after *executor* disconnecting

I missed the retaining part. So then we need to figure out why retaining does not work as expected. Because if we kill testator after executor has subscribed the test pass when ran together with all other tests.
Add this to `src/test/travis/acl` under the anonymous section. Otherwise no one can publish to this topic.
